intent_atoms.description: Provide full tkhd track header parsing capability in BoxParserRegistry.trackHeader to extract versioned timestamps, flag states, transformation matrices, and presentation dimensions.
ParsedBoxPayload.TrackHeaderBox must include all parsed fields and be exportable as JSON for UI and export surfaces.
Regression tests cover synthetic version 0/1 cases, disabled-track handling, and baseline fixture assertions with regenerated JSON snapshots.
ParsedBoxPayload.TrackHeaderBox must always contain valid timestamp, flag, matrix, and dimension data derived from the tkhd payload.
